==== a.js (11 errors) ====

     * @template out T
     * @typedef {Object} Covariant
     * @property {T} x
     */
    
    /**
     * @type {Covariant<unknown>}
              ~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Covariant'.
     */
    let super_covariant = { x: 1 };
    
    /**
     * @type {Covariant<string>}
              ~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Covariant'.
     */
    let sub_covariant = { x: '' };
    
    super_covariant = sub_covariant;
    sub_covariant   = super_covariant; // Error
